summary:
With this mod,you will sound like unique dragons when shouting.
I created this for myself but i decided i will share with community.
Enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
If you like...Endorse.

V 1.1 Features:

Yol-Tor-Shul - Fire Breath
Fo - Krah - Diin - Frost Breath

Upcoming (finished already but testing):
Storm Call
Unreleting force
Ethereal Form


I dont have time to edit more so you will have to wait a little bit more for next release.


This mod adds a shout sound which with youll sound like Odahviing,Alduin or Parthurnax when shouting.
So i hope you will like it!

Installation:
Unzip in Data/Sound folder.
To be sure if you installed correctly go to your data-sound folder and there should be voice-skyrim-esm folder.

Uninstall:
Delete what youve extracted!
author: Xahstur
